decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
LB Ext & Int works to match existing
+3 DES Submit detail before work on part
Demoition - only as prt of complte dev
DES No plant etc on roof unless on drwgs
description: Variation of condition 8 of listed building consent dated 12 April 2018 (RN:17/09924/LBC) for the: Use of 8 Grosvenor Square and 1a and 2 Duke's Yard as a single family dwelling with rear extensions to 8 Grosvenor Square at second to fourth floor levels; infilling of east lightwell and creation of terrace at third floor level; new plant room at roof  level. Demolition of ground and first floor rear extension to 1a and 2 Duke's Yard and replacement with new building on sub-basement, basement and ground floors with extended garden terrace to main house over. Use of 1 Duke's Yard as a single family dwelling.  Associated internal and external alterations to all buildings. [Site includes Nos.1, 1a and 2 Duke's Yard]. NAMELY, to allow alterations to the roof plant ductwork, attenuator and air intake/exhaust; amendment to flue; introduction of hoop iron and lanterns to railings at Brook Street elevation; amended CCTV positions at Brook Street Elevation & Courtyard East Elevations; and internal amendments to the swimming pool, garages and stairs. (S19 application).
